thread.title: Fisher Rushmer, P.A. Celebrates Six Attorneys Recognized in the 2026 Edition of The Best Lawyers in America®
thread.title_full: Fisher Rushmer, P.A. Celebrates Six Attorneys Recognized in the 2026 Edition of The Best Lawyers in America®

author: EIN Newswire
title: Fisher Rushmer, P.A. Celebrates Six Attorneys Recognized in the 2026 Edition of The Best Lawyers in America®
text:
Fisher Rushmer, P.A., proudly announces that six attorneys are featured in the 32nd edition of The Best Lawyers in America®.
ORLANDO, FL, UNITED STATES, January 7, 2026 /EINPresswire.com/ — Fisher Rushmer, P.A. is proud to have six (6) of its attorneys recognized in the 32nd edition of The Best Lawyers® in America.
The six attorneys recognized in the 2026 edition of The Best Lawyers in America include Joseph L. Amos, Jr., David A. Corso, John Edwin Fisher, Walter Ketcham, Jr., Gary H. Rushmer, and C. Eugene Shipley. These respected attorneys received the award in the following practice areas for Orlando, Florida:
Joseph L. Amos, Jr. (Recognized in Best Lawyers® since 2012)
– Commercial Litigation
– Personal Injury Litigation – Defendants
– Professional Malpractice Law: Defendants
– Professional Malpractice Law: Plaintiffs
David A. Corso (Recognized in Best Lawyers® since 2013)
– Medical Malpractice Law: Defendants
– Personal Injury Litigation: Defendants
John Edwin Fisher (Recognized in Best Lawyers® since 2010)
– Bet-the-Company Litigation
– Commercial Litigation
– Legal Malpractice Law: Defendants
– Personal Injury Litigation: Defendants
– Professional Malpractice Law: Defendants
Walter Ketcham, Jr. (Recognized in Best Lawyers® since 2024)
– Insurance Law
– Personal Injury Litigation: Defendants
Gary H. Rushmer (Recognized in Best Lawyers® since 2012)
– Personal Injury Litigation: Defendants
– Personal Injury Litigation: Plaintiffs
– Professional Malpractice Law: Defendants
– Professional Malpractice Law: Plaintiffs
C. Gene Shipley (Recognized in Best Lawyers® since 2025)
– Commercial Litigation
Since its first publication in 1983, Best Lawyers has become universally regarded as the definitive guide to legal excellence. Best Lawyers recognitions are compiled based on an exhaustive Purely Peer Review® evaluation. The 2026 edition results highlight the top 5% of U.S. attorneys.
John E. Fisher, a shareholder at the Fisher Rushmer firm, expressed great pride in having six colleagues recognized in the 2026 edition of Best Lawyers in America. “This accolade reflects the consistent dedication and expertise of our attorneys and highlights Fisher Rushmer’s dedication to providing outstanding legal services.”
About Fisher Rushmer, P.A.
The Orlando law firm of Fisher Rushmer, P.A. has provided quality legal advice and services to clients in Central Florida and throughout the entire state since 1984. At Fisher Rushmer, P.A., clients are served by attorneys, not case managers, so you receive the highly skilled representation that you need in a cost-conscious manner. Recognized for excellence year after year, Fisher Rushmer, P.A., remains a top-ranked law firm throughout Florida, offering the resources of a large law firm with the personal touch of a smaller one.
About Best Lawyers®
Best Lawyers® is the oldest and most respected peer-review research and marketing company in the legal profession. Best Lawyers® compiles extensive recognitions by conducting exhaustive peer-review surveys in which tens of thousands of leading lawyers confidentially evaluate the work of their fellow legal professionals within their local market and specialty. Lawyers are not required or allowed to pay a fee to be listed; therefore, recognition by Best Lawyers is considered a singular honor. For more information, visit www.bestlawyers.com.
Leslie Cebollero
Fisher Rushmer, P.A.

Best Lawyers® compiles extensive recognitions by conducting exhaustive peer-review surveys in which tens of thousands of leading lawyers confidentially evaluate the work of their fellow legal professionals within their local market and specialty.
